name: Instable (Frosty :))
description:
Instable - Being forgetful has it's repercussions and you have forgotten a serious medical report in the office without checking it.  All you need is a small trip to the office to get it back, sounds easy right? Well, not really as all hell breaks loose once your psychotic episode starts...

The game is a  featurette of some mechanics that I am planning to explore and work on while learning game dev. This is no way is the final build and I might continue to make this experience longer and more spooky over time. 

Controls - Use WAD for movement, mouse to look around and E to use the elevators when they are intended to work. While having the scene with no lights, the circles would guide your way. They depict your hand sensations and their sizes would depend on how far the closest object is to them, each circle's size is independent as something might be closer to your left then to your right.
